TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Macedonia, title = Macedonia, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macedonia} }

S.FORM: Macedonia u Macedonia (馬其頓, Ma-Ce-Dun) sa i labu nu Europe (O-Cuo 歐洲), itiza i 41 50 N, 22 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 25,713 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 25,433 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 280 km2. hamin nu tademaw sa 2,100,025. kakalukan umah sa 44.30%, kilakilangan umah sa 39.80%, zumaay henay umah sa 15.90%. tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Skopje . kakingingan nu kanatal demiad kakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 8 bulad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (cong-tung, 總統) ayza sa ci Stevo Pendarovski, micakat a demiad sa i 2019 a mihcaan 5 bulad 12 demiad. ayda nu laylay nikudan ni kilisetu enem (6) a seci tu lawpes Sela-fu a binacadan malingatu malimad tayda i Maci-tun (Macedonia mueneng, misumad tu sasinggiaan nuheni tu tunceciw . nikudan nikilisetu siwa (9) a seci Maci-tun (Macedonia Slavic wan-kuo mapatideng, tinii i cacay a bataan (10) a se-ci caaysa tu lekal. Maci-tun (Macedonia madebung nu hekalay a binacadan sawni paliyuntu i hekalay a tademaw mami kuwan, namaka sabaw tu cacay a (11) a seci sa, Maci-tun (Macedonia a tademaw kinapina palekal tu sakaada, malawpetu numi kuwanay, namaka cacay a malebut tulu a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1392) a mihcaan Macedonia mala madebung nu E'tuman Tuelci-tikuo mumikuwanay makaala tu lima a secian kunipikuwan. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (1913) a mihcaan sakatusa anikalpacawan tu Balkans , mahedek satu malepacaw idaw kunikasasulit tu Pucia-lesete' a kiyakuan , u Pawcia-liya (Bulgaria , Si-la (Greece atu Sayel-wiya (Serbia tatuluay a kanatal makakilac tu Maci-tun (Macedonia . 1919 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku siwa (1919) a mihcaan sakacacay nu kitakitay a nikalepacawan nikudan palu tatengan misuayaw tu Paw, Si, Say nu tuluay a kanatal mikilac tu Maci-tun . 1944年8月" . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku sepat (1944) a mihcaan waluay a bulad patideng nu "Nande-lahu ming-culan-pan ", Maci-tun (Macedonia payniyadu' a mikeliday panutek mala Nanse-lahu lan-pan . 1945年4 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku lima (1945) a mihcaan sepat a bulad Nanlan Cong-tung ci "Dituo " pacakaten nuheni ku Maci-tun (Macedonia mala Nanse-lahu lan-pan enemay a micumud nu kunghe-kuo , tanektektu kunipisiteked nu Maci-tun . 1991 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku cacay (1991) a mihcaan Nanlan maliwasak, Maci-tun kunhe-kuo nama hekal nikasasuadaan, kapahsa i siwa a bulad walu a demiad mihapu misitekae kamisa, tawya a mihcaan sabaw tu cacay a bulad sabaw tu pitu a demiad Maci-tun kunhe-kuo patideng tu baluhay a sian-fa . 1993年4月8 Former Yugoslavia Republic of Macedonia (FYROM)之名稱加入聯合國. cacay a malebud siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tulu (1993 ) a mihcaan sepat a bulad walu a demiad inuayawan a Nanse-lahu Ma-citun kunghe-kuo "Former Yugoslavia Republic of Macedonia", (FYROM) a ngangan ku sapicumud tu lanhekuo. 2019年2月12 ". tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku siwa (2019) a mihcaan tusa a bulad sabaw tu tusa a demiad makaykictu atu Si-la a nganganan nikacenlawan tatenga masumad ku ngangan u " peimaci-tun-kunhe-kuo " cence nu ayda . peimaci-tun nuayawan " Maci-tun " sinfa itida i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku cacay (1991) a mihcaan asiwantan. . Cung-tung u tadenga'ay nu kanatal a sakakaay nu hitay amikeliday, lima a mihcaan kunikala Cung-tung, u binawlan a tademaw ku misingkuway a patideng, Cung-tung anisingkiwan a kina tusaan a misingkuw kiya matatungus. . cen-ti 政體 u ihun mincuce. i labu u Cun-li atu katuuday a sakakaay nikapulungan, mikuwan tu kakawawen. . Cun-li kumi kuwanay tu kawaw, u satalakaway nu tapang, u kuohu a katuuday nu tan ku tahekalay, aw Cung-tun ku panganganay kiya midui ku kuohu. . kasa'timan a kawaw han: pasayda i kuohu patahekal tu sasakamuen, patahekal tu hulic, palutadenga tu nutaw a sihu, atu nutaw anikalecabayan, patahekal panganga tu sakay hekal a sakakaay. Maci-tun kunhe-kuo atu biyaw nu kanatal Si-la (Greece masasualaw tu pinganganan (Si-la ilabu nu kanatal idaw ku Maci-tun sen (Macedonia niyadu', Si-la (Greece a tademaw saan tu Maci-tun a ngangan micayatay tu Si-la (Greece a kawaw), nina tusaay a kanatal caay kasasu bahel ku belbel, nina tusaay a kanatal namaka cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku cacay (1991) a mihcaan Maci-tun (Macedonia misiteked satu mabiyalaw tu. (Prespa Agreement). mangalay misakapah tu nikacinglawan, nina tusaay a kanatal namaka tusa a bataan idaw ku pitu a mihcaan sa, i tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (2018) a mihcaan enem a bulad sabaw tu tusa a demiad masasulit tu Lasepa'a sasulitan (Prespa Agreement) a kiyakuan. nikasasulitan katukuh i tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku siwa (2019) a mihcaan, u Si-la (Greece patikuen nuheni i O-mum (European Union atu Peieyi misuaay tu Ma-cutun (Macedonia nipicumudan tu funciecun , Maci-tun kunhe-kuo i nuydaan a mihcaan nu tusa a bulad sabaw tu tusa a demiad tatengan misumad tu ngangan u peimaci-tun kunhe-kuo .

Macedonia o Macedonia (馬其頓, Ma-Ce-Don) sa i labo no Eorope (O-Coo 歐洲), itiza i 41 50 N, 22 00 E. o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 25,713 km2. o ahebal no lala'ay sa 25,433 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa 280 km2. hamin no tademaw sa 2,100,025. kakalokan omah sa 44.30%, kilakilangan omah sa 39.80%, zomaay henay omah sa 15.90%. tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Skopje . kakingingan no kanatal demiad kakinging no kanatal demiad sa 8 bolad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (cong-tong, 總統) ayza sa ci Stevo Pendarovski, micakat a demiad sa i 2019 a mihcaan 5 bolad 12 demiad. ayda no laylay nikodan ni kiliseto enem (6) a seci to lawpes Sela-fo a binacadan malingato malimad tayda i Maci-ton (Macedonia moeneng, misomad to sasinggiaan noheni to tonceciw . nikodan nikiliseto siwa (9) a seci Maci-ton (Macedonia Slavic wan-koo mapatideng, tinii i cacay a bataan (10) a se-ci caaysa to lekal. Maci-ton (Macedonia madebong no hekalay a binacadan sawni paliyonto i hekalay a tademaw mami kowan, namaka sabaw to cacay a (11) a seci sa, Maci-ton (Macedonia a tademaw kinapina palekal to sakaada, malawpeto nomi kowanay, namaka cacay a malebot tolo a lasobo siwa a bataan idaw ko tosa (1392) a mihcaan Macedonia mala madebong no E'toman Toelci-tikoo momikowanay makaala to lima a secian konipikowan. cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko tolo (1913) a mihcaan sakatosa anikalpacawan to Balkans , mahedek sato malepacaw idaw konikasasolit to Pocia-lesete' a kiyakoan , o Pawcia-liya (Bolgaria , Si-la (Greece ato Sayel-wiya (Serbia tatoloay a kanatal makakilac to Maci-ton (Macedonia . 1919 . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko siwa (1919) a mihcaan sakacacay no kitakitay a nikalepacawan nikodan palo tatengan misoayaw to Paw, Si, Say no toloay a kanatal mikilac to Maci-ton . 1944年8月" . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo sepat a bataan idaw ko sepat (1944) a mihcaan waloay a bolad patideng no "Nande-laho ming-colan-pan ", Maci-ton (Macedonia payniyado' a mikeliday panotek mala Nanse-laho lan-pan . 1945年4 . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo sepat a bataan idaw ko lima (1945) a mihcaan sepat a bolad Nanlan Cong-tong ci "Ditoo " pacakaten noheni ko Maci-ton (Macedonia mala Nanse-laho lan-pan enemay a micomod no konghe-koo , tanektekto konipisiteked no Maci-ton . 1991 . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo siwa a bataan idaw ko cacay (1991) a mihcaan Nanlan maliwasak, Maci-ton konhe-koo nama hekal nikasasoadaan, kapahsa i siwa a bolad walo a demiad mihapo misitekae kamisa, tawya a mihcaan sabaw to cacay a bolad sabaw to pito a demiad Maci-ton konhe-koo patideng to balohay a sian-fa . 1993年4月8 Former Yogoslavia Repoblic of Macedonia (FYROM)之名稱加入聯合國. cacay a malebod siwa a lasobo siwa a bataan idaw ko tolo (1993 ) a mihcaan sepat a bolad walo a demiad inoayawan a Nanse-laho Ma-citon konghe-koo "Former Yogoslavia Repoblic of Macedonia", (FYROM) a ngangan ko sapicomod to lanhekoo. 2019年2月12 ". tosa a malebot cacay a bataan idaw ko siwa (2019) a mihcaan tosa a bolad sabaw to tosa a demiad makaykicto ato Si-la a nganganan nikacenlawan tatenga masomad ko ngangan o " peimaci-ton-konhe-koo " cence no ayda . peimaci-ton noayawan " Maci-ton " sinfa itida i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo siwa a bataan idaw ko cacay (1991) a mihcaan asiwantan. . Cong-tong o tadenga'ay no kanatal a sakakaay no hitay amikeliday, lima a mihcaan konikala Cong-tong, o binawlan a tademaw ko misingkoway a patideng, Cong-tong anisingkiwan a kina tosaan a misingkow kiya matatongos. . cen-ti 政體 o ihon mincoce. i labo o Con-li ato katooday a sakakaay nikapolongan, mikowan to kakawawen. . Con-li komi kowanay to kawaw, o satalakaway no tapang, o kooho a katooday no tan ko tahekalay, aw Cong-ton ko panganganay kiya midoi ko kooho. . kasa'timan a kawaw han: pasayda i kooho patahekal to sasakamoen, patahekal to holic, palotadenga to notaw a siho, ato notaw anikalecabayan, patahekal panganga to sakay hekal a sakakaay. Maci-ton konhe-koo ato biyaw no kanatal Si-la (Greece masasoalaw to pinganganan (Si-la ilabo no kanatal idaw ko Maci-ton sen (Macedonia niyado', Si-la (Greece a tademaw saan to Maci-ton a ngangan micayatay to Si-la (Greece a kawaw), nina tosaay a kanatal caay kasaso bahel ko belbel, nina tosaay a kanatal namaka cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo siwa a bataan idaw ko cacay (1991) a mihcaan Maci-ton (Macedonia misiteked sato mabiyalaw to. (Prespa Agreement). mangalay misakapah to nikacinglawan, nina tosaay a kanatal namaka tosa a bataan idaw ko pito a mihcaan sa, i tosa a malebot cacay a bataan idaw ko walo (2018) a mihcaan enem a bolad sabaw to tosa a demiad masasolit to Lasepa'a sasolitan (Prespa Agreement) a kiyakoan. nikasasolitan katokoh i tosa a malebot cacay a bataan idaw ko siwa (2019) a mihcaan, o Si-la (Greece patikoen noheni i O-mom (Eoropean Union ato Peieyi misoaay to Ma-coton (Macedonia nipicomodan to fonciecon , Maci-ton konhe-koo i noydaan a mihcaan no tosa a bolad sabaw to tosa a demiad tatengan misomad to ngangan o peimaci-ton konhe-koo .
